text: Vuga uti “Yemwe bagaragu banjye bemeye! Nimugandukire Nyagasani wanyu; ba bandi bakoze neza kuri iyi si bazagororerwa ibyiza (Ijuru). Kandi isi ya Allah ni ngari (niba aho muri bitaborohera kugaragira Allah, nimwimukire ahandi). Mu by’ukuri abihangana bazagororerwa ibihembo byabo byuzuye, nta kugera.”
